concept.title: Log Types and Location of Log Files

section.p:
writes its logging information into the following log files:
system.log: System status, errors, warnings, and debug information.
access.log: User logins.
audit.log: System security status.
The log files are stored in the location defined by the LOG_FILE_PATH configuration setting. By default, they are located in the following directory:
In addition to the -specific log files, the application server log file (server.log) is another source for tracking system usage and possible errors.
